en.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
en.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by {{8//10//12//14//16%}}, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an extra {{8//10//12//14//16%}}. When the wearer defeats an enemy, their ATK is increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}} for 2 turn(s).

zh.name: 星海巡航
zh.description: 使装备者的暴击率提高{{8//10//12//14//16%}}，装备者对生命值百分比小于等于50%的敌方目标暴击率额外提高{{8//10//12//14//16%}}。当装备者消灭敌方目标后，攻击力提高{{20//25//30//35//40%}}，持续2回合。
